user_query: I'm a teacher planning a field trip for my students to a local zoo. Can you give me the current weather conditions and air quality at the zoo? Also, provide me with the 16-day weather forecast and any active alerts in the area.

TaskList.description: Get the current weather conditions at the local zoo.
Get the current air quality at the local zoo.
Obtain the 16-day weather forecast for the local zoo.
Check for any active weather alerts in the area of the local zoo.
